allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add harvester service, admin console, and development tooling

This commit adds the complete harvester pipeline system for distributed web crawling, an admin console for managing crawl sources and viewing execution logs, comprehensive documentation, and improved development tooling.

Major additions:
- Harvester service with BullMQ-based 6-stage pipeline (scheduler, fetcher, extractor, normalizer, writer, alerter)
- Admin console UI for managing crawl sources, executions, and logs
- Database migrations for Source, Execution, and ExecutionLog models
- New API routes for harvester control and monitoring
- CLAUDE.md, QUICKSTART.md, and SETUP.md documentation
- dev.sh script for managing all three services
- Seed scripts for test data

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(do echo "Testing model: $model" curl -s https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages -H "x-api-key: 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" -H "anthropic-version: 2023-06-01" -H "content-type: application/json" -d "{""model"": ""$model"", ""max_tokens"": 10, ""messages"": [{""role"": ""user"", ""content"": ""Hi""}]}")
